${ModID}:ExamplePatronCutscene.NAME: Example patron Cutscene
DESCRIPTIONS: "Hello, I am a blacksmith of great renown."
"What can I do for you, weary traveler?"
You receive your weapon back and it feels to be greatly improved.
You feel much lighter after shedding some excess supplies.
"Let me know if you change your mind."
OPTIONS: I would like you to smith my stuff.
I would like you to remove my stuff.
